amendment.description: To grant a Federal charter to Korean War Veterans Association, Incorporated.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1445 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1445 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12500-12501) To grant a Federal charter to Korean War Veterans Association, Incorporated.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1445 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1445 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sarbanes.
